reviewText: Teepa Snow is amazing and shares a great message! This is a must have for carepartners!

Ms. Snow may be great but to pay over $250 for all her "lessons" is ridiculous. Is she trying to help others, or make herself a bundle? Given the lack of sales, what's the point? If the series cost too much, as these do, they help no one because few will purchase such expensive books/DVDs, etc.  I'm not buy in - top spendy. The Alz Asso has great info, too ... free!
Fabulous tips enabling caretakers to feel empowered, not overwhelmed.  Thank you Teepa Snow for giving us coping skills.
Teepa Snow is the best...great ideas and approaches to handling a loved one with dementia.  Some suggested approaches although effective are not practical due to a caregiver's time constraints.
